Producer: Andy Coverdale, Kara Durrett, Floyd Russ, Corey C. Waters
Screenwriter: Floyd Russ, Ariana Ron Pedrique, Vilma Vega
Synopsis: Ayar, a first-generation American Latina, returns home to reunite with her daughter. Her mother, Renata, refuses to let her see her due to COVID-19, and Ayar is confronted by the many roles she's been forced to play.
Title: Ayar
